title: About
content: Little Flower Higher Secondary School is known for academic excellence and student development.

title: Facilities
content: Our facilities include a library, sports complex, hostel, and cafeteria.

title: Academic Calender
content: The Academic Calendar for the upcoming academic year is now available! Please review the calendar for important dates including the start of the semester, exam periods, holidays, and more.

title: Application
content: The deadline for submitting applications for Specify Program/Scholarships/Internships is fast approaching! Make sure to complete your application before the cutoff.

title: Prospectus
content: Prospectus is now available for students who wishes to pursue studies at Little Flower school.

content: The Exam Routine for the upcoming exams has been released! Please make sure to check the official schedule for your exam time and dates.
